org.ngi

Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ngi.FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    File IO Handling helper to remove the file functions from the main body.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setDirty

        public void setDirty()
        Flag the file as being modified.

      • isDirty

        public boolean isDirty()
        Allow external check of file modification - used when closing.
        Returns:
        True if the file has unsaved changes, false otherwise.

      • closeProcedure

        public boolean closeProcedure()
        Close procedure to check for dirty file and save as needed or signal an abort on window close by returning false.
        Returns:
        True if window can close, or false if window should not close.

      • setWindowTitle

        public void setWindowTitle()
        Set the file path to display. If the file has not been saved, the file path will be a message.

      • newFile

        public void newFile()
        Start a new File

      • openFile

        public void openFile()
        Open a saved Graph Node.

      • saveFile

        public boolean saveFile()
        Save the current Node Graph file. This will prompt for a file if none is specified.
        Returns:
        True if process can proceed, halt on false (window closing ).

      • saveFileAs

        public void saveFileAs()
        Save the current NodeGraph to a new file.

      • getSCADFileName

        public java.lang.String getSCADFileName()
        Get the Output CAD file path - used specifically by the File Output Node.
        Returns:
        Path of the SCAD output file.
